org.wlf.filedownloader.file_download.file_saver

接口 Save

  • 所有已知实现类:
    FileSaver

    public interface Save
    save data
    保存接口
    作者:
    wlf(Andy)

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void saveData(ContentLengthInputStream inputStream, long startPosInTotal)
      save data

    • 方法详细资料

      • saveData

        void saveData(ContentLengthInputStream inputStream,
            long startPosInTotal)
              throws Exception
        save data
        参数:
        inputStream - the inputStream data needed to save
        startPosInTotal - the start position of inputStream start to save in total data

        |(0,totalStart)----|(startPosInTotal,inputStream start)--- |(inputStream.length,inputStream end)----|(fileTotalSize,totalEnd)

        抛出:
        Exception - any fail exception during saving data
